content.rendered:
Directed by Hari.

Written by Hari. Hari. Hari. S.K. Prasad.

Cast Vikram(ACP Ramsaamy / DCP Aarusaamy). Keerthy Suresh(Diya Viswanathan). Aishwarya Rajesh(Bhuvana). Bobby Simha(Raavana Pichai). Prabhu(G. Viswanathan). Ramesh Khanna(‘Punctuality’ Paramasivam). Soori(Sakthi). O.A.K. Sunder(Mahendra Pichai). John Vijay(Devendra Pichai). Kota Srinivasa Rao(Perumal Pichai). Sudha Chandran(Perumal’s second wife). Crane Manohar(Aarusaamy’s aide). Delhi Ganesh(Srinivasan). Sumithra(Bhuvana’s mother) .Mohammed Absar. Imman Annachi(SI Thangavelu). Chaams(Sundaram). Uma Riyaz Khan(Inspector Noorjahan). Praveena(Meenakshi).Pondy Ravi. Singamuthu(Brahmin). Bala Singh(Aatangkarai Shanmugam). Thyagu(Aiyarettu Sundaram). Sanjeev Venkat(Santhosh IPS)

Language Tamil.

Producers Shibu Thameens.

Production Thameens Films.
